comments.body: Quote from: Bitzlato on December 16, 2022, 08:00:12 PM$8,000 BTCPeriod: 1 monthRepayment amount: $8,150 i can repay every week 10%collateral: 32 eth on ethereum beacon chain stakingGod bless you my child :-P

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: How would you provide the collateral? Is your ETH staked through a liquid staking protocol? (i.e Lido)

comments.author: Bitzlato
comments.body: Quote from: TryNinja on December 16, 2022, 08:19:36 PMHow would you provide the collateral? Is your ETH staked through a liquid staking protocol? (i.e Lido)eth is staked on beacon chain, i can share the account, this is what i can give as collateral

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Quote from: Bitzlato on December 16, 2022, 08:22:10 PMeth is staked on beacon chain, i can share the account, this is what i can give as collateralA "bit" risky since we both would have the private key? How would I liquidate the collateral if you could move everything to another address ASAP, right after eth devs implement the unstaking function?

comments.author: Bitzlato
comments.body: Quote from: TryNinja on December 16, 2022, 08:26:32 PMQuote from: Bitzlato on December 16, 2022, 08:22:10 PMeth is staked on beacon chain, i can share the account, this is what i can give as collateralA "bit" risky since we both would have the private key? How would I liquidate the collateral if you could move everything to another address ASAP, right after eth devs implement the unstaking function? solved, someone from my community borrowed me
